sentences: Muhamed Fazlagić (Serbo-Croatian Cyrillic: Мухамед Фазлагић; 17 April 1967), known as Fazla, is a singer from Bosnia and Herzegovina.
In 1993, Fazla represented Bosnia and Herzegovina at the 1993 Eurovision Song Contest with the song "Sva bol svijeta".
Fazla finished in sixteenth place with 27 points.
